name: Color Teaser
summary:
Color Teaser is a fast paced mind bending brain teasing game that will tease, confuse and possibly make you rage.
How many of you know that your right-brain tries to say the colour but your left-brain insist to say the word. That is right, with Color Teaser, we like you to experiment yourself and find out how good you are with responding to both side of your brains signal.
In a very short time you will have to choose the answer based on the color of the text and not based on what is written. We warn you that if you choose the incorrect answer at any level then you will have to start all over again from level 1.
